should have posted this along with the link

goofy is right the subs don't work for about 7 minutes, but after that point they reappear. The part of the movie where there are no subs there is not much being said anyway aside from that conversation with the gray haired guy.

p.s. I searched everywhere for a better copy of english subtitles, but these are the best ones. much better than nothing and after the subs reappear you forget that any where missing. the missing subs aren't at all vital to understanding what is going on in the movie.

It's weird how Romanian perfect subs came out so soon before the english ones.

Anyway the movie's looking awesome and I have to say, that this is the best action movie of the decades.

Just so you know, there are no asian subtitles in this release because they've been cropped out of the picture.

The widescreen format used in this released was achieved by cropping the top and bottom of the video, so around 30% of the picture is missing.

If you're okay with this, download away, otherwise look for a different release.
